system:
note description: "An output handler for the command-line mode of ETF." author: "JSO and Jackie Wang" date: "$Date$" revision: "$Revision$"
class ../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xmlETF_CMD_LINE_OUTPUT_HANDLER
inherit FalseETF_OUTPUT_HANDLER_INTERFACE redefine ../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_makemake, ../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_log_commandlog_command end
create ../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_makemake -- Initialization for Current. local m_access: ../tracker/tracker_access.xmlTRACKER_ACCESS do file#f_featurePrecursor ../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_modelmodel := m_access.../tracker/tracker_access.xml#f_mM end
feature -- Queries
f_model../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_modelmodel: ../tracker/tracker.xmlTRACKER
f_model_state../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_model_statemodel_state: FalseSTRING_8 -- Return a string representation of current model state do create Result.Falsemake_empty Result.Falseappend (../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_modelmodel.../tracker/tracker.xml#f_outout) Result.Falseappend ("%N") end
feature -- Log to 'output'
f_log_model_state../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_log_model_statelog_model_state -- Log current model state to 'output' do Falseoutput := ../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_model_statemodel_state end
f_log_command../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_log_commandlog_command (a_cmd: ../tracker/etf_command.xmlETF_COMMAND) -- Log the effect of 'a_cmd' to 'output' local l_command_name: FalseSTRING_8 do l_command_name := "->" + a_cmd.Falseout + "%N" if a_cmd.Falseetf_cmd_message.Falsecount = 0 then Falseoutput := Falseoutput + l_command_name Falseoutput.Falseappend (../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xml#f_model_statemodel_state) else Falseoutput := Falseoutput + l_command_name + " Error: " + a_cmd.Falseetf_cmd_message end end
end -- class ../tracker/etf_cmd_line_output_handler.xmlETF_CMD_LINE_OUTPUT_HANDLER
